com.reactivecascade.reactive

Class ReactiveString

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.reactivecascade.util.Origin
      • com.reactivecascade.reactive.Subscription<T,T>
        • com.reactivecascade.reactive.ReactiveValue<String>
          • com.reactivecascade.reactive.ReactiveString
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAsyncOrigin, IGettable<String>, INamed, IReactiveSource<String>, IReactiveTarget<String>, IReactiveValue<String>, ISafeGettable<String>, ISettable<String>

    public class ReactiveString
extends ReactiveValue<String>
    A String which can be updated with various string operations in an atomic, thread-safe manner.

    This is similar to an AtomicInteger with reactive bindings to get and set the from in reactive chains (function sequences that can fire multiple times).

    Created by phou on 30-04-2015.

    • Field Summary
